bubble_sort.title: Bubble Sort Basic Algorithm
bubble_sort.description: Given an array of unsorted numbers, implement a basic bubble sorting algorithm which takes that input and orders the numbers from lowest to highest using that implementation
bubble_sort.input_desc: An array of numbers arr (1 ≤ len(arr) ≤ 1000).
bubble_sort.output_desc: A new array of strings sorted from lowest to highest using bubble sort
constraints: The sorting must be done using bubble sort. Other sorting implementation will not suffice
